titles.title: John Was In The Spirit, On The Lord's Day

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
John was in the Spirit, on the Lord's day.
He heard a voice from heaven.
And this is what it said, I'm Alpha and Omega,
The beginning and the end; behold I live for evermore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Behold I live; behold I live for evermore.
Behold I live; behold I live for evermore.
